DOC.brief_summary: To obtain genotypic analysis patient chronic exudative age-related macular degeneration note subretinal intraretinal edema despite continuous monthly Anti-VEGF therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Genetics Study Wet Age-Related Macular Degeneration ( AMD ) Non-Responders Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor ( VEGF ) Therapy
DOC.criteria: Ability provide write informed consent participation study Subjects diagnose neovascular AMD monthly antiVEGF regimen ( > 10 ranibizumab and/or bevacizumab injection within last year ) still intraretinal subretinal fluid confirm Investigator Subjects Pigment Epithelial Detachment Exclusively Subjects Serous Pigment Epithelial Detachments Subjects history follow : idiopathic polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy pathologic degenerative myopia central serous chorioretinopathy familial drusen adult onset foveal pattern dystrophy
DOC.keyword: Genetic analysis patient Wet AMD respond fully anti-VEGF treatment
